updates.title: Variable width strokes
updates.description: You can now adjust the width of your stroke at any given point along a path with the new variable width stroke vector editing tool. Available in Figma Draw and Figma Design. Learn more in this help center article.

updates.title: Bring a consistent look and feel to your Figma Make prototypes and web apps
updates.description: You can now bring styling context from an existing library into Make, and specify additional rules for your Make to follow.

updates.title: Never miss a beat with browser notifications from Figma
updates.description: You can now opt-in to receive push notifications from Figma in your browser, the same way you do in Figma’s desktop app. Once you allow Figma to send you notifications in the browser, you will be alerted to comment replies, @ mentions in comments, and @ mentions in the file (i.e. on a sticky in FigJam) in real time.
